actions.recommendation: Before we proceed with any supportive autoimmune intervention, it would be prudent to get a report from your Rheumatologist and hear his thoughts on reducing some of your medicines, this has not been done since your diagnosis. Please do the same with your optometrist.
Your blood pressure was elevated when done with the nurse, but was normal in our consultation. Please pop in to check this every few months.
Vitamin D , Omega 3 , Multivitamin
Please do the same with your optometrist.
You currently experience fluctuating energy levels, situational anxiety, intermittent joint aches and pains.
It is recommended to seek help for your mental health concerns. Consider reaching out to a therapist or counselor.
Consider joining a support group for people with Sjogren's syndrome to connect with others who understand your experiences.
Consider practicing stress management techniques such as meditation, deep breathing exercises, or yoga to help manage your anxiety.
Consider seeking out a physical therapist to help manage your joint pain.
Consider seeking out a rheumatologist for ongoing management of your Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a neurologist for ongoing management of any potential neurological symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a dermatologist for ongoing management of any potential skin symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out an endocrinologist for ongoing management of any potential hormonal imbalances related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a gastroenterologist for ongoing management of any potential digestive symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a pulmonologist for ongoing management of any potential respiratory symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a cardiologist for ongoing management of any potential heart symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a nephrologist for ongoing management of any potential kidney symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a hematologist for ongoing management of any potential blood symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a psychiatrist for ongoing management of any potential mental health symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a psychologist for ongoing management of any potential mental health symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a social worker for ongoing management of any potential social or emotional issues related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a nutritionist for ongoing management of any potential nutritional issues related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a physical therapist for ongoing management of any potential fatigue related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a pain management specialist for ongoing management of any potential pain related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a rehabilitation specialist for ongoing management of any potential mobility issues related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a speech therapist for ongoing management of any potential speech or swallowing issues related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a vision specialist for ongoing management of any potential eye symptoms related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a hearing specialist for ongoing management of any potential hearing issues related to Sjogren's syndrome.
Consider seeking out a dentist for ongoing management of any potential dental issues related to Sjogren's syndrome.
